chunk:
Directions: (1) Dispense 3-4 pumps of cleanser and massage into damp skin, avoiding the eye area. (2) Thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
